name: Sekrets of the Dungeon
storyline:
Sekrets Of The Dungeon is a 2D dungeon crawler platformer in which you have to try to solve all the secrets of the dungeon, losing yourself, not stepping aside ... And return home!
Go to a mysterious dungeon, simultaneously uncovering its secrets and making your way through hordes of enemies with one main goal to find and solve the main mystery of this place someday: "The unknown secret source", which no one has yet reached.
summary: Sekrets of the Dungeon - a 2D platformer in the genre of Dungeon Crawler, where you have to try to solve all the secrets of the dungeon, losing yourself, without stepping aside... And go home!
